# Nass {#nass}

Here is the information available for steelhead CUs in the Nass region. Steelhead CUs in this region were defined in [Parkinson et al. 2005](https://salmonwatersheds.ca/library/lib_521/).

![Map of the Nass region of the Pacific Salmon Explorer and steelhead monitoring sites](_bookdown_files/map_nass_monitoring.png)


## *Nass Summer*

CU id 480

![CU boundaries](_bookdown_files/480.cu.png)

### Populations 

```{r echo=FALSE}
cu_list <- read.csv("_bookdown_files/steelhead_cu_population_lookup_2022.csv")


cu_list[ (cu_list$cu_id %in% c("480")), c(3,4,11)]

```
